divs: Sighting Detailswe were stuck in the mud from thrying out a newtoyota 4 runner it got stuck in the mud so we had to walk out to get to a phone when we knoticed it hover in the sky above us we looked up at it and it turned on very bright light that we commented o how bright it my uncle noticed that see could see that i need to shave my face then the light go realy bright. then we herd airplains move up on our possission it slowly turned off the spot light which was very brigth the ufo took off in a westerly direction that was very fast . with in 20 sec. a formation of jet fighters. apperered theses fighters couldnt even keep up or come close to keeping up with when we rechecked our watcheswe had walked aprx.2 miles in less than 15
